# llms.txt — AI usage guidance for SEO India Online Free Blog
# https://seoindiaonline.pages.dev/

site_name: SEO India Online Free Blog
site_url: https://seoindiaonline.pages.dev/

description:
SEO India Online Free Blog is a free digital marketing and SEO publishing platform.
The site hosts expert-written articles, tutorials, and insights related to SEO,
online marketing, analytics, and business growth.

content_type:
- blog articles
- SEO tutorials
- digital marketing guides

allowed_use:
- indexing
- summarization
- citation with attribution
- educational and research usage

disallowed_use:
- full-content reproduction
- resale of content
- training proprietary commercial models without permission

preferred_citation:
"SEO India Online Free Blog" — https://seoindiaonline.pages.dev/

crawl_priority:
- https://seoindiaonline.pages.dev/
- https://seoindiaonline.pages.dev/post/

contact:
